Class EspressoStandApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • EspressoStandApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class EspressoStandApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    User Interface for the Espresso Stand project. Allows customers to select combos Displays current inventory and total $ receipts
    Version:
    Fall 2010
    Author:
    CSC 142

      • testEspressoStand

        public static void testEspressoStand()
        This test method generates 3 orders, one using each of the different constructors, then "places" the orders. One of three return values from processOrder is printed. Finally, an inventory report is requested and then the total sales are checked using getTotalSales and printed. This method also processes an order with a second ES object. 142 STUDENTS: You SHOULD understand the code shown below.
